title: KSK Mahanadi to NCLT: Change of circumstances calls for fresh bidding
description: KSK Mahanadi Power Company, represented by its Resolution Professional's counsel, informed the NCLT, Hyderabad, on Monday, that new circumstances necessitate a reissuance of bids under the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP) for KSK Mahanadi Power, which entered insolvency proceedings in October 2019.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
